website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed lightweight stroller that stands out with its stylish and upscale feel. Expensive, and if you are going to pay this much, we recommend the gb Pockit.
pros: A solidly designed portable stroller choice, the UPPAbaby is easy to turn, durable, and with a comfortable seat and padded handles, a prime choice for babies and parents alike
cons: Occasional issues with brakes locking up or being difficult to use
Some also felt it was slightly overpriced

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great stroller. I wish I could say that I did a ton of research, but I was looking for a lightweight (but very solid) stroller that would fold up easily and be great for travel. This is totally that stroller. It is easy to fold up (we also bought the travel bag) and great for everything from a farmer's market to the airport. It reclines just enough to get a little nap and can hold a ton of extra bags on the handles and in the basket. (Biggest issue is when your toddler decides to get out -- watch out for the tip back). This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lightweight stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. Its a beautiful color and it is so easy to fold up and transport. It's very light weight and we use it when traveling frequently. The canopy is large too. The space under it is a little small though. We can't fit our diaper bag in it, so when we load it up, I have to only take what is totally necessary. There is room for a cooler bag with two 8 oz bottles of formula, a few diapers, a toy, a change of clothing, and a flexible changing pad. But not a diaper bag. Easy to push, I've used it on grass and pavement. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AnonyBits

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a travel stroller to supplement the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel stroller to supplement the city mini. Although it is lighter, I prefer the features of the city mini, the sun shade is a joke on the uppababy, the handles hurt your hands after a while and it doesn't recline as well as the city mini. Only benefits of this stroller is it is slightly lighter and has a carry strap.
customer_reviews.author: Madhuri Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to use. Very lightweight and also sturdy. It feels very safe. The wheels and shock absorption are fantastic. We do a lot of walking on rough trails and dirt/gravel/cobblestone. It is so smooth and my little one enjoys our walks now. The only drawbacks I've found are that the reclining positions are way too far back, especially for a child over ten months old. My little one strains to sit up and see things. The other drawback is that the handles aren't adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: NoraKnowsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: High End Umbrella Stroller
customer_reviews.text: As new grandparents, we purchased this to have on hand when our year-old grandson visits. Our daughter has the UppaBaby Vista and we wanted something more compact that would maneuver well on uneven downtown streets. This fit the bill; well designed and sturdily made, it has all the features we were looking for. The only (slight) negative is that it doesn't have much side support, but that hasn't seemed to bother our grandson since he sits up well on his own. All around, a good purchase. It's pricey but I saved some money by buying an open-box new stroller listed by Amazon Warehouse, which arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: EC10023

customer_reviews.title: I like it but don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I do like that this is a sturdy umbrella stroller but the seat in its normal position is still slightly reclined. I find that after I open it I have to always adjust the seat. Maybe that's normal for umbrella strollers, I don't know. I wish that when it is folded, the wheels would not stick out as much which is quite important for me as a city mom who gets on and off buses with her toddler. I would not recommend this to other city moms if you take buses and shuttle jitneys.
customer_reviews.author: Momable Me

customer_reviews.title: what a STEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this stroller for a long time. To pay less for an older model is a deal! Can I buy all their late models?! It literally slides like soft butter through a knife! It comes with a cup holder and has enough room in the bottom for a bag. nearly no assembly excepting popping on the front legs. easy to adjust the seat and it is sooo light! We are travelling to Australia and this is perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Arvind G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome!!!! I didn’t want to spend this much money on an umbrella stroller but it was definitely worth it. We took it on a trip overseas and it performed very well through airports, beaches, walks to the park and putting it in and out of the car is easy. It is a a little bulky but it works for us. The sun canopy blocks a lot of the sun which is a MUST and also the storage basket is big (very important when you are traveling) I wanted a comfortable, long lasting and good quality stroller and I think I found it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for baby and easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very easy to push, even one handed! My 9-month old is very comfortable and happy in it and typically falls asleep on longer outings. The cup holder is a little small so I got an additional parent organizer for cups, phone, etc. It is a little tricky to figure out how to close if you aren't familiar, but not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Four

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice stroller but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stroller but not worth the money. It’s compact, can be pushed with one hand and I like that it stands on it’s own. I also like the adjustable foot rest. I am going ro return it though because the sun shade doesn’t not provide enough coverage and it tips super easily with my diaper bag attatched with the baby not in it. I feel like I can get what I need in the chicco liteway.
customer_reviews.author: AliReg

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunshade Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel stroller if you want something a little sturdier. It's not the lightest product out there. We also bought the travel case which is excellent for checking when flying. The stroller is definitely great for longer walks and the reclining back makes for easier naps. The main feature which sold us is the extremely large sunshade with UBV50 protection. No other stroller we found had such expansive sun cover. I'd highly recommend this for any family looking for a well made and lasting umbrella stroller.
customer_reviews.author: CBachtle

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this stroller! Thank you UPPAbaby!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good idea for a young baby, but for a toddler or older this is great and easy to use! Drawbacks-two hand fold, when reclined can't get to the basket, the seat cover won't stay on right.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this stroller in leu of our Vista stroller and it has been WONDERFUL. Our favorite feature is the fact that when it’s folded down, it can stand up. It’s perfect in restaurants, when you don’t have a lot of space. Our kid loves it. It is definitely an investment, by we have found that it was defiantly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller that we purchased for our recent trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller that we purchased for our recent trip with a four month old baby to Florida. It was easy to maneuver and also easy to check at the gate before boarding. Make sure you buy the Travel Bag too. Love the extension for the legs that is adjustable and also love the fact that the back reclines for napping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid stroller
customer_reviews.text: best stroller for traveling. If you buy the transport bag ($60-70) it insures the value of the stroller by the manufacturer. I didn't know this until a store told me so. Thats a great value. I also recommend buying the extra coffee cup. its like $15 and is more rigid that the one in the box.
customer_reviews.author: dyne540

customer_reviews.title: Cool stroller
customer_reviews.text: I dig this stroller. It’s made of nice materials and looks cool. However even in its forward most position, it’s very reclined. Feel like my daughter would be a lost happier if she was a little more vertical and could look out better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I had to send this stroller back for three reasons ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this stroller back for three reasons: 1/ The buckle malfunctioned every time I tried to open and close it 2/ The basket constantly came unfastened by itself 3/ The seat back didn't always stay locked in an upright position However I give the seller 5 stars - we received the product quickly and the return went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: RCham

customer_reviews.title: The best travel stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have taken the stroller out to Japan and Scandinavia, walked between 10 and 15 km per day, all kind of terrains and it works perfectly. Great sun protection and big enough storage on the bottom. Downside is that it is a bit large when folded, but would not hesitate on buying again.
customer_reviews.author: argamo

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but will make a great everyday or errand stroller
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Smooth ride, good recline, great sun coverage, height of the handlebars is perfect, locks easily, folds and unfolds easily, stands on its own, cool colors, nice that the foot rest is adjustable as well. Cons: Feels a little cheap where the recline lever is- the framing in back is plastic , the canopy also seems really poor quality (specifically the extra silver canopy portion), heavier than I expected, I like the carry strap, however, its big and bulky so makes carrying for more than 5 minutes uncomfortable, over priced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: At full upright position this feels like my child is reclining
customer_reviews.text: At full upright position this feels like my child is reclining. Beautiful quality - soft! Doesn't easily collapse - I have to press a catch on the leg to get it to close. Great storage space. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: junk seat functions such that my son slumps in the ...
customer_reviews.text: junk seat functions such that my son slumps in the upright position my feet kick the wheels when we walk wish i could have test driven this one before purchasing (because then i wouldn't have!)
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight! Easy to handle. I love the big shade and sun protector. Seat is awesome. We already use this for my 2 month old and he loves it. He looks comfortable at the fully reclined position. He looks safely strapped in. The only issue are the wheels. The stroller vibrates and doesn't move nicely over bumps. I get that it's not all terrain and I only use this for walks around the neighborhood but I assumed the wheels would be better for the price and upgrade from last years model.
customer_reviews.author: AliAl

customer_reviews.title: The cushion on the seat is sooo soft and comfortable. The extended canopy is perfect for sunny days
customer_reviews.text: This stroller shows so much quality. The cushion on the seat is sooo soft and comfortable. The extended canopy is perfect for sunny days. It's so easy to fold and open. The carry handle is so convenient. We use the cup holder all the time.
customer_reviews.author: HanC

customer_reviews.title: Decent stroller, but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for nearly one year. It's one of two strollers (bugbaboo donkey is the other) and we don't use either all that much. We've always had trouble with the brake (stiff and gets stuck) - now it's completely locked up. You might want to try before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: HS311

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend..
customer_reviews.text: i must say i absolutely love this stroller. it’s so easy to use, clean and maneuver. my daughter loves it too. we went through 3 strollers before finding the perfect one. should of just stick with the uppababy. had the vista, but wanted something a little easier since she is a toddler now and we don’t need all the extra stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great but...
customer_reviews.text: I love uppa baby. The only reason I gave this five stars is because the seated upmost position is just a little too reclined for my liking. My baby is quite nosey and wants to see everything so I find her trying to sit up more than the incline allows.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! I can see this lasting us way into the 3-4 year old range when you strap the kiddos in just to keep them from running off in a crowd. I've wasted my money on the cheap umbrella strollers just to junk them when they get too big or they just fall apart for no good reason. Well worth the money spent on this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat uppababy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one after my summer infant umberella stroller fell apart after 1 year. We already own a Cruz but needed a light weight stroller for when we travel. The G-luxe is a great light weight stroller and looks great. The basket under the stroller has plenty of storage. I was able to fit a large purse, dslr, water bottles and a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for the purpose, excellent baby mover
customer_reviews.text: pros: all are pros exception of the following: Double wheel set up on the front wheel means twice the rattle. 2018 version have remedied this though. It's functionally fine, but it just adds the clunkyness to this beautiful stroller.
customer_reviews.author: RiverOtter

customer_reviews.title: Great For Travel
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller for travel. Its light, it reclines, and it's amazing quality. You can't go wrong with UPPAbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine N

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stroller. A little big and bulky as an "umbrella stroller," but it is very lightweight and easy to maneuver. The wheels are sturdy and hold up on various terrains. The seat is very comfortable for our baby. She has been riding in it since she was 5 months old and does wonderfully. I love the SPF shade and feel very confident putting her in this. Really great baby product!
customer_reviews.author: DrakeLiz F.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to graduate to an umbrella stroller! Up to now we've been using the Britax B-Agile, which we love, but I figured who doesn't love an uppababy! Yeah no. It is incredibly cumbersome, I can't open it, I can't fold it. The Britax opens and closes in one swift motion. This also isn't light and it's just as bulky as a newborn stroller without the comfort of a place to rest your head on the side. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MSIIBookLover

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for baby during travel
customer_reviews.text: great stroller. purchased for a vacation requiring air travel Purchased the travel case to ensure coverage in case airline damaged the stroller. very comfortable for baby, either sitting up or reclining to sleep. love the UV shade. great storage area underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller specifically for my 2 yr for a trip to Disney World because of the recline feature. I love my g-lite but needed the recline feature for napping and did not want to travel with my Vista. It far exceeded my expectations!!! Was so perfect for him to nap as well as carry all our junk. Super easy to fold and store for plane (in UppaBaby travel bag) and when getting on and off Disney transporation. I saw so many G-luxe strollers on our trip and lots of sleeping kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Susann Shea

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other options
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is much better than the previous stroller we had. The handles are higher up so you aren't straining your back when pushing your kid around. It is difficult to fold but once you figure it out its easy. It folds into a manageable size so it can fit in a regular car's trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Gujupike

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love all Uppababy products and found the G-Lux stroller to be awesome for travel. It's lightweight, easy to fold up and comes in hbdsybwhen wrangling little ones at the airport, hotel, beach etc...
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Really great little stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: Really a fantastic umbrella stroller. Baby was comfortable and happy. It's easy to stroll but does require two hands for maneuvering. I wish the basket was larger but it is an umbrella stroller so it can't be everything. Also it has the fantastic uppababy sunshade, which is invaluable. It also comes with a cup holder which mama loves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE G-Luxe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this stroller. Bought this for my 1 year old after researching umbrella strollers. I wanted something small that had the features of a regular stroller. Loved my Uppababy Cruz and other Uppababy products so after testing out the G-Luxe with its recline & uv extended canopy shade I had to have it. My older daughter (3yrs) can fit in it as well. My 1 year old sleeps well in the gluxe and its all around exactly what I was looking for. Only down side is the bottom net basket is small and hard to get to. But that's all umbrella strollers. I just store wipes, diapers & changing mat in there.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella stroller, but no lateral space for the child to rest his head, and not a good access to the storage space beneath it. Other then that, great!
customer_reviews.author: CissaG

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this stroller. The best part of this stroller is the canopy. It can be adjusted up and down. My baby is very small so I leave the canopy very low and she is happy about it. I wish there was mesh option, though. It is very hot to my baby. When I get her out of the stroller she is soaked in sweat. 😓
customer_reviews.author: Kimchi Fried Rice

customer_reviews.title: stands on its own better than others
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, stands on its own better than others. Love the cup holder. My only complaint is that my daughter tends to slip down. I figure this is just because its an umbrella stroller so not a huge deal since its not our primary stroller (UB Vista). Bought it for travel, worked great. Fan of UB overall.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: "Makena" is not purple; it's fuchsia/pink
customer_reviews.text: Just a word of warning - great stroller - but the Makena color is a fuchsia with a strong pink to it. On Amazon and in the UPPAbaby promo photos the color looks like a solid purple, and it says 'purple' on the box. But when we pulled it out of the packaging - we instantly agreed it was fuchsia, bordering on a dark pink, and not even close to the photos. It's not a bad color if that's what you want - but it wasn't for us - so we got to experience Amazon's easy returns. No harm no foul, but come on, UB, use a lighter touch on those Photoshop vibrance/saturation sliders...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable stroller with a good recline
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable stroller with a good recline, adequate storage, generous canopy, and a decent ride. However, while it is light it is still quite large when folded. It was the deal breaker for us, and we returned the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Timasmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson along with the rain cover. His parents rave about this stroller - say its the best ever. You can also buy the traveler cover which is great if you are travelling by plane to protect the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Conniemoly

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Slightly lighter and higher than a McLaren. Good for tall persons. Sun canopy is also big and very usefull in hot countries. Removable padding makes washing very easy, especially when my baby eats cookies in the stroller. One of the few umbrell stroller that can recline which makes napping much more comfy! I've had 4previous strollers (McLaren, Joolz, Quinny and ComfortBaby) and this one is definitively the most convenient because of the light weight and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie rihon

customer_reviews.title: A nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: The baby enjoyed riding in this stroller because he could see more around him. The stroller's wheels also roll extremely smoothly and freely.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra few pounds!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a little bulky for an umbrella stroller, it's worth the extra 2-3 pounds to have a travel stroller that reclines. My little one will still nap in this stroller - and actually preferred it to the pack and play that Grandma had! Another great product from Uppababy!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller. We use it as our second and travel stroller. Well made and it will last. Yes, it's more expensive but it will pay off in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: pb87

customer_reviews.title: its a good looking stroller but i wish i had done more ...
customer_reviews.text: its a good looking stroller but i wish i had done more research cause you can get as equally good if not better stroller for way less money
customer_reviews.author: Ema P

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stroller, would highly recommend!! My little loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable, our 2yo loves it and it has never ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, our 2yo loves it and it has never been an issue to sit her on it. It reclines a lot so it is perfect for nap time. Our daughter can sleep almost her two ours on it without waking up. Very light, easy to fold and unfold. Love the cup holder too. The only think I don't like is the net under the seat. Very small and almost impossible to put something in or out when the kid is on.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Diaz Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It makes so much noise when is pushed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stroller. The olny thing is that it makes so much noise when u push it . I don’t knw if is only me.... but other wise is a very nice stroller.
customer_reviews.author: sileny

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Easy to use. We bought it for a trip we were taking out of state. Flew with it and loved having it in the airport. I loved the look of the black on black. The stroller has a great shade cover.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Prentice

customer_reviews.title: The stroller runs smoothely and is very attractive. Very ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller runs smoothely and is very attractive. Very difficult to close and put away so hard to travel with at the airport where u are opening and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Micol Bartolucci

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this stroller. Very easy to open and close, lightest stroller that money can buy, and looks great. Haven't travelled with this yet but this seems to be made for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan Tal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was a little skeptical but as soon as it arrived it blew my mind. It's comfortable (or so I'm told by a happy baby) and lightweight. Can be easily cleaned with removable parts and overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Culley

customer_reviews.title: Just great all around
customer_reviews.text: Just great all around. Used for a trip to Cuba on cobblestone paths and some 'off roading' with no problems. The reclining seat is a game changer for naps while on the go. Did a lot of research and comparison and glad I was able to snag this nice stroller on sale.
customer_reviews.author: ANC

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  You won't regret speeding the $
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought the stroller from the beginning. It is so much nicer and more functional than the $400 full size stroller I bought previously. We LOVE this one. Very luxurious feel, sturdy and soft. Huge sun shade. I can't say enough good things about this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: my baby still love to ride on it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 3 years ago, my baby still love to ride on it, good!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Chen

customer_reviews.title: After a lot of research, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Yep. I love it. It is easy to fold down once you get the sequence of it. Love the big carrying strap. The handles are at a nice height and tilted at a more natural angle. Manages curbs and side walks pretty well. After a lot of research, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: my son dose not like this stroller
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I would not but again .my son dose not like this stroller.It has no tray or tray you can buy.It's annoying,to fold and unfold.Very expensive for a stroller that never is used.
customer_reviews.author: debra walsh

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more upright. Sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if the seat was more upright. Undercarriage storage is pretty useless. Super comfortable with nice padded handles. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very great stroller, we love the color, very light weighted and easy to maneuver around the city!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A really good stroller, not sure it's worth the price though
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter weight stroller, definitely well constructed. Wish it had a pocket on the back for holding smaller items (eg cell phone) and a couple more recline positions. Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea H

customer_reviews.title: So far pretty awesome. It is heavy for umbrella stroller however ...
customer_reviews.text: So far pretty awesome. It is heavy for umbrella stroller however we bought it for upcoming travel with toddler who we planning to nap in stroller. Reclining is nice and drives well.
customer_reviews.author: ann bklyn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to open and close!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stroller after a huge disappointment with the Joovy. I am glad I invested a bit more money on a stroller that is a breeze to open and close ( which is the contrary with the Joovy). The seat is smaller than what I would like, but my little has enough room to nap, and it's very comfortable. It's very light and easy to maneuver. I'm loving this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. My son is very comfortable in it and being that I am 6'-2" I do not have the back strain like I do with other umbrella strollers. Very light too. Happy customer. Keep it in my car for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Patchett

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable,, I had the first version for my son a couple years ago and loved it back then. The only problem I have is when you close the stroller, it can get tricky to push and pull the tab on the side of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N

customer_reviews.title: A no brainier for babies above 8-9 months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our first son, now 7 years later we have ordered the same for our second one. Loved the whole stroller except for a little glitch or squeaky wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Chetan Singh

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy to open and close even while holding my little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older version of the GLuxe. This is so easy to open and close even while holding my little guy and he seems very comfortable in it. It's very lightweight, turns easily and does pretty well on uneven surfaces. Was also extremely easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P

customer_reviews.title: I'm short so carrying it over my shoulder was hard but easy to pull by handle when folded and carrying diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it. she likes that she can nap fully reclined. and very light. I'm short so carrying it over my shoulder was hard but easy to pull by handle when folded and carrying diaper bag over shoulder and daughter on hip.
customer_reviews.author: shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: Good, light-weight stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, folding mechanism could be made a little easier. No other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't survive without this stroller. I've been everywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't survive without this stroller. I've been everywhere with us - to three continents and several domestic flight. Buy the travel bag - it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to maneuver. Folds up nicely and has a decent carrying handle. Love the color. Good recline for when the baby wants to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaCNM

customer_reviews.title: must be comfortable for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons like this stroller. Suprisely, my younger one fell in sleep in it which he never did on his current one when we pushed him out for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Z Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, compact
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, compact, and yet has the maneuverability of a jogger. Great for traveling places, air travel etc. I would recommend getting the UPPAbaby Travel bag G-Series as well.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for my daughter and grandson. She loves it. It's light, easy to use and looks really good. It's also comfortable for my grandson. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: amdb906

customer_reviews.title: Small. Lightweight. Easy to clean. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Highly recommended. I went through several strollers before I bought this one and I wish I had bought this from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awful stroller. It broke down after about 9 months after normal usage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Leny

customer_reviews.title: It folds up easily, is light weight and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a must have for any parent with a child. It folds up easily, is light weight and easy to clean. I highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stroller! Started using it at 3 months for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stroller! Started using it at 3 months for my son and he is always so happy sitting in it. Sometimes I even let him sit in this stroller in the house because he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn F.

customer_reviews.title: great stroller. we had the uppa baby vista (2011)
customer_reviews.text: great stroller. we had the uppa baby vista (2011), which was great as well, but we no longer needed something that big. this stroller is compact, but has the comfort of a vista. it is durable over cobblestone and on long walks through the city.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Uppababy product
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent Uppababy product. We have the Vista in Denny Red and use it on a regular basis. We bought the g-luxe for our umbrella stroller to use for quick errands and use when our child outgrows the Vista.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! We use this & the City Mini- a perfect combination!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller. Easy to take to the airport and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Stroller. Easy to take to the airport and travel with. I can push stroller with one hand and it goes in the right direction. Great brand, great stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a great stroller. Love the way it manouver
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a great stroller. Love the way it manouver. It's very easy to open and close and it reclines very well However it seems not to go all the way up when in a sitting position. My toddler likes to be sitting up and this stroller has a bit of a recline other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Yulianela Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is by far my favorite. I've tried every make and kind you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mother of three boys under 4. This stroller is by far my favorite. I've tried every make and kind you can think of. It's light, very easy to use and the quality doesn't compare to anything we have. This is my new go to stroller. The $900 stroller will be staying home from now on !!
customer_reviews.author: Raising Cubs

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stroller. Light but still sturdy. Great for traveling internationally.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love my stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love my stroller. My only thing is it does not come with a snack tray. Other than that. Great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this stroller once we received it
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this stroller once we received it. The canopy is not big enough for sunny California. Which is a huge factor for me. Plus the amount of money this thing costs, it should feel a bit sturdier. Wheels seem too small, but this is an umbrella stroller. I also did not like the bottom basket. It seems cheaply made and is hard to access, especially when seat is in recline position. I ended up returning this and I am still on the hunt for the "perfect" stroller. The only good thing was that it is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love this stroller. super easy to use, lightweight, our baby loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Blydenburgh

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry and fold
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to carry and fold. Baby loves the softness of the seat. Does not recline all the way flat but enough that it is comfortable to sleep. in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeyko Garuz

customer_reviews.title: I had the MacLaren Quest and never liked it for a number of reasons
customer_reviews.text: I had the MacLaren Quest and never liked it for a number of reasons. I LOVE the GLuxe and use it almost every day (I also have the Vista and hardly ever use it anymore). My only issue with it is that it can be a bit tough to fold, but other than that it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Excelente stroller. My son loves it. It's very easy to fold and unfold. No love the recline features.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela R Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it should be.
customer_reviews.text: So we love that this is compact and folds up tightly (although my wife still can't figure out how to fold it after owning it for 15 months. There are two things that have caused problems for us. The back left wheel sounds like a bicycle with a card in it. The older versions apparently could have the wheel replaced...but it's super loud. The second problem is the rainshield is worthless. We've gone through 3 of them in a year. We now have to replace it after a year and three months which shouldn't have to happen. We don't abuse it...just normal usage.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality stroller yet light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality stroller yet light weight. Comfortable for my kids and very easy to maneuver around. Very happy with the product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pongpairoj

customer_reviews.title: I really love it and my toddler does too
customer_reviews.text: I really love it and my toddler does too! Love, love the extendable sunshade that comes with it. The first few times it's kinda hard to unfold and open but, eventually it becomes easy the more you use it. It's a great light weight stroller!
customer_reviews.author: C. Are

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Small enough to keep in the back of my small SUV, (Honda CRV) but large enough to be comfortable for baby and parents all day. Found a small diaper bag that actually fits into the storage basket (so no tipping issues). With the large canopy, near full recline and cup holder it's really everything you need. Plus the purple we picked is gorgeous. The very first time we took it out a stranger complimented our "beautiful stroller". We already have a BOB Flex stroller, which is amazing and our preference for homes, long walks, etc. But we really wanted something to keep in the car that didn't take up the space the BOB does.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: this stroller carry one of the best reviews so I bought it
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! this stroller carry one of the best reviews so I bought it, but after a year of use, I consider it is the worst purchase I ever made. reason is simple: 1, direction is so difficult to control, so hard to push and turn. 2, without baby in the seat, if I put anything on the handle, whole stroller will flap back and fall off. the second reason is so common, lots reviews complained about this unbalanced design. anyway, DO NOT BUY!!!!! look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! We loved it. A little bigger then expected. You may want a Mclaren if you want smaller.
customer_reviews.author: hcmelo

product_meta.title: UPPAbaby G-LUXE Stroller, Denny (Red)
product_meta.description: Color:RedSay hello to lightness without saying goodbye to functionality. Comfortable and agile, the G-Luxe is feature-packed yet nothing has to weigh you down. Life moves fast, and the G-Luxe moves with you. Featuring our new one-action brake and lightweight aluminum frame with new robust profile.
feature_bullets: New one action brake plus lightweight aluminum frame with robust profile
Easy open, removable height adjustable canopy and shock-absorbing, 4-wheel suspension
Easy to remove fabrics and seat pad
Extendable SPF 50 plus sunshade. Spacious Storage
For children 3months (in full recline position) to 55lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars269 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
